column5: Since I hold a CDL and USA Truckers can still cross the border, I will be putting a few boxes of freight in my pickup and head on up for a week of fishing
Donâ€™t blame you at all and hope you have a great time.

I assume this was posted in jest, but in case not, to clarify to everyone, a CDL does not qualify anyone to cross into Canada unless in fact they are legitimately hauling freight, this requires a broker and all the normal paperwork, duties, ect. I called Canada Border Patrol at Ft Frances and they confirmed this.
You always said you wanted to experience the Canadian prison system!
I find it hilarious you actually called, I have my own authority and use my own broker, have done this many times with my company, I can't see a problem with this. Don't be jealous
I heard they let you have tv's and computers in your cell, Plus gourmet meals, I'll take my chances
He'll get turned away at the border. And you wont be able to stop at Black Bear Casino on your way back.....there closed too !!!!
Reddemon2 any chance I could hitch a ride in the back of your truck?ill pack light a few poles and tackle box drop me off at prov1800 front door,thanks
Iam classified as non essential.Ha what do they know.
